Identity.History: "[...]; the foot-soldiers also scatter showers of missiles, each man having several and hurling them to an immense distance, and being naked or lightly clad with a little cloak."\nTacitus, De Origine et situ Germanorum, 98 CE.
Identity.Tooltip: The young and inexperienced were sometimes used to throw a range of objects, from spears to stones, at the enemy.
